error.message: In the definition of simpleType B, <xsd:minLength value="7"/> is not compatible with the following facets defined in one of the ancestors of simpleType B, specifically simpleType A [ located at file:/C:/SQC-REC/samples/bad.xsd ] : <xsd:minLength fixed="true" value="10"/> The basetype facet is declared fixed. Therefore, the value of <xsd:minLength value="7"/> must be 10.

In the definition of simpleType E, <xsd:minLength value="30"/> is not compatible with the following facets defined in one of the ancestors of simpleType E, specifically simpleType C [ located at file:/C:/SQC-REC/samples/bad.xsd ] : <xsd:maxLength value="20"/>
